semantic_identifier: [GOLD-94]: Normalize CRM stage/field mappings into a canonical lifecycle model
title: Normalize CRM stage/field mappings into a canonical lifecycle model

sections.text: Implement a canonical Sales_Accelerator lifecycle schema (stages + required fields) and add a normalization layer that maps each connected CRM instance’s custom stages/field names into this schema. The mapper should support per-instance overrides and persist mappings so downstream analytics consume only canonical values. Include basic validation to flag unmapped stages/fields and block analytics jobs from using partially mapped lifecycles.
